question: Match List I with List II and choose the correct answer.
List I: 1. Nitrogen rich fertilizers, 2. Carbon dioxide, 3. Carbon monoxide, 4. CFCs
List II: p. Ozone depletion, q. Eutrophication, r. Greenhouse effect, s. Air pollutant
explanation: Nitrogen fertilizers cause Eutrophication (1-q), CO2 causes Greenhouse effect (2-r), CO is an Air pollutant (3-s), and CFCs cause Ozone depletion (4-p).
